Apple___healthy.message: No action needed. Maintain regular observation.

Apple___black_rot.message: Remove and destroy infected branches and fruit. Apply fungicides early and maintain orchard sanitation.

Apple___scab.message: Apply recommended fungicides at bud-break. Rake and remove fallen leaves. Use resistant varieties if available.

Apple___rust.message: Remove nearby junipers (alternate host), prune, and apply fungicides at first symptoms.

Cherry___healthy.message: No action needed. Maintain standard care.

Cherry___Powdery_mildew.message: Remove heavily infected leaves. Apply fungicides as needed. Increase air circulation.

Corn___Cercospora_leaf_spot_Gray_leaf_sp.message: Use resistant hybrids. Apply fungicides if disease pressure is high. Practice crop rotation.

Corn___Common_rust.message: Plant resistant varieties. Fungicide applications can reduce severe outbreaks.

Corn___Northern_Leaf_Blight.message: Use crop rotation and hybrids with resistance genes. Apply fungicides if necessary.

Grape___Black_rot.message: Prune infected tissues. Apply fungicides early in the season. Remove fallen leaves and fruit.

Grape___Esca_(Black_Measles).message: No effective cure. Remove and destroy infected vines. Avoid wounding during pruning.

Grape___Leaf_blight_(Isariopsis_Leaf_Spo.message: Remove and destroy symptomatic leaves. Apply fungicides as recommended.

Orange___Haunglongbing_(Citrus_greening).message: No cure available. Remove and destroy affected trees. Control psyllid vectors aggressively.

Peach___Bacterial_spot.message: Remove and destroy affected fruit/twigs. Apply bactericides as needed. Plant resistant varieties.

Pepper_bell___Bacterial_spot.message: Apply copper-based sprays. Remove infected plants and plant debris. Use certified seeds.

Potato___Early_blight.message: Remove infected leaves. Apply fungicides. Rotate crops annually.

Potato___healthy.message: No action needed. Maintain routine care.

Potato___Late_blight.message: Immediately remove and destroy infected plants. Avoid overhead watering. Rotate with non-host crops.

Raspberry___healthy.message: No action needed. Maintain regular care.

Soybean___healthy.message: No action needed. Monitor through the season.

Squash___Powdery_mildew.message: Remove and destroy heavily infected leaves. Use fungicides as recommended. Increase spacing for airflow.

Strawberry___healthy.message: No action needed. Regular surveillance encouraged.

Strawberry___Leaf_scorch.message: Remove infected plants. Use resistant varieties where possible. Apply fungicides if needed.

Tomato___Bacterial_spot.message: Remove symptomatic leaves. Use copper-based bactericides. Use certified, disease-free seeds.

Tomato___Early_blight.message: Remove lower infected leaves. Apply fungicides regularly during humid periods.

Tomato___healthy.message: No action needed. Routine observation suggested.

Tomato___Late_blight.message: Remove and destroy all affected plants immediately. Disinfect tools and avoid replanting in affected soil.

Tomato___Leaf_Mold.message: Increase air movement. Apply fungicides as soon as symptoms are detected.

Tomato___Septoria_leaf_spot.message: Remove infected foliage. Apply fungicides and avoid overhead watering.

Tomato___Spider_mites_Two_spotted_spider.message: Use miticides if necessary. Increase humidity; remove severely affected plants.

Tomato___Target_Spot.message: Apply approved fungicides. Practice crop rotation with non-host plants.

Tomato___Tomato_mosaic_virus.message: Remove and destroy infected plants. Disinfect tools after each use.

Tomato___Tomato_Yellow_Leaf_Curl_Virus.message: Remove affected plants, control whitefly populations, use resistant cultivars if available.
